data.title: Currency Calculator
data.meta_description: Convert the most popular world currencies at effective exchange rates with the Western Union currency converter calculator. Send money around the world and help your business grow.
data.text:
We are committed to keeping your data secure.

Ease and convenience

Send money the way thatâs convenient for you: online, via the app, or in person at an agent location.

Send money and check {senderCurrencyCode} to {receiverCurrencyCode} exchange rate through our website, app, or in person at an agent location.

Speed and transparency

Send money in minutes* for fast cash pickup and easily track your money along the way.

Send money in minutes* for fast cash pickup and easily track your money. Just enter the {senderCurrencyCode} amount to be converted to {receiverCurrencyCode}.

Worldwide reach

We make an average of 25 transfers per second and move money from Saudi Arabia to over 200 countries and territories.

We make an average of 25 transfers per second and move money from Saudi Arabia to over 200 countries and territories.

Quick and easy registration

Simply register online and verify your profile to send and receive money 24/7.

Pay the way you like

Pay online through your bank account, with your credit or debit card, or cash in-store.

Track your transfer

Easily track your money transfer online or via the Western UnionÂ® app.
